log
procedure log(
p_log_state pit_log_state_type
)

Method implmenents the PIT_TABLE.log method to write log information to table PIT_TABLE_PARAMS.  Overloaded version to log a <p_log_state_type> instance.

purge
procedure purge(
p_date_until in date,
p_severity_greater_equal in number default null
)

Method implmenents the PIT_TABLE.purge method to purge log information from tables PIT_TABLE_LOG, PIT_TABLE_CALL_STACK and PIT_TABLE_PARAMS

Parameters
p_date_until
in date

Date up to which the log entries are to be deleted

p_severity_greater_equal
in number

Optional severity up to which the log entries are to be deleted
